pantiltzoom: • Pan Range: -170° to 170° • Tilt Range: -25° to 90° • Digital Zoom: 4x1 • Manual pan speed: 1-10 • Manual tilt speed: 1-10 • Pre-set setting: 10 points
resolutions: • 16:9 (support frame rate up to 30 fps)- 1280 x 720, 640 x 352, 320 x 176, 160 x 80
remotemanagement: • Configuration accessible via web browser • Take snapshots/video clips and save to local hard drive via web browser
videocompression: • JPEG for still images • H.264/MPEG4/MJPEG format simultaneous compression • H.264/MPEG4 multicast streaming
certifications: • FCC Class B • CE • CE LV D • C-Tick
videofeatures: • Configurable image size, quality, frame rate, and bit rate • Time stamp and text overlays • Configurable motion detection windows • Configurable shutter speed, brightness, saturation, contrast, mirror, flip • Three configurable privacy mask zones
security: • Administrator and user group protected • Password authentication • HTTP and RTSP digest encryption
